sst.name: Sea Surface Temperatures
sst.long_description: This dataset provides daily estimates of global sea surface temperature (SST) based on observations from multiple satellite sensors. Resolution: 5km. .Available from September 1981 to current. More Information

analysed_sst_uncertainty.name: Sea Surface Temperature Uncertainty
analysed_sst_uncertainty.short_description: Daily Sea Surface Temperature Estimate Uncertainties

analysed_sst_anomaly.name: Sea Surface Temperatures Anomalies
analysed_sst_anomaly.short_description: Daily Sea Surface Temperature Anomaly Estimates
analysed_sst_anomaly.long_description: This dataset provides estimates of the difference between global sea surface temperature (SST) based on observations from multiple satellite sensors and the historical average value. Resolution: 5km. .Available from September 1981 to current. More Information

lst_s3a_day.name: Daytime Land Surface Temperatures - Sentinel3A
lst_s3a_day.long_description: This dataset provides EOCIS land surface temperature daytime data. Resolution: 5km. .Available from 2016 to current. More Information

lst.name: Daytime Land Surface Temperatures - Sentinel3A
lst.short_description: Daily Daytime Land Surface Temperature Estimates observed by Sentinel3A

lst_s3b_day.name: Daytime Land Surface Temperatures - Sentinel3B
lst_s3b_day.long_description: This dataset provides EOCIS land surface temperature daytime data. Resolution: 5km. .Available from 2016 to current. More Information

lst.name: Daytime Land Surface Temperatures - Sentinel3B
lst.short_description: Daily Daytime Land Surface Temperature Estimates observed by Sentinel3B

lst_s3a_night.name: Nightime Land Surface Temperatures - Sentinel3A
lst_s3a_night.long_description: This dataset provides EOCIS land surface temperature nighttime data. Resolution: 5km. .Available from 2016 to current. More Information

lst.name: Nighttime Land Surface Temperatures - Sentinel3A
lst.short_description: Daily Nighttime Land Surface Temperature Estimates observed by Sentinel3A

lst_s3b_night.name: Nighttime Land Surface Temperatures - Sentinel3B
lst_s3b_night.long_description: This dataset provides EOCIS land surface temperature nighttime data. Resolution: 5km. .Available from 2016 to current. More Information

lst.name: Nighttime Land Surface Temperatures - Sentinel3B
lst.short_description: Daily Nighttime Land Surface Temperature Estimates observed by Sentinel3B

chuk_elevation.name: Elevation
chuk_elevation.long_description: Each UK 100m grid cell is assigned an elevation above sea level

urban_area.name: Urban Area Fraction
urban_area.short_description: Fraction of 100m CHUK grid cells designated as urban
urban_area.long_description: Fraction of 100m CHUK grid cells with land cover designated as urban

suburban_area.name: Suburban Area Fraction
suburban_area.short_description: Fraction of 100m CHUK grid cells designated as suburban
suburban_area.long_description: Fraction of 100m CHUK grid cells with land cover designated as suburban

chuk_landcover.name: Land Cover
chuk_landcover.long_description: Each UK 100m grid cell is assigned a land cover type
